Our Services

Comprehensive Physiotherapy Services

We offer a wide range of specialized physiotherapy services tailored to your needs, ensuring the best possible care and recovery outcomes.

Physiotherapy

Comprehensive physical therapy for pain relief, mobility improvement, and functional recovery.

  • Pain Management
  • Mobility Training
  • Strength Building
  • Functional Exercises

Neuro Rehabilitation

Specialized rehabilitation for neurological conditions and stroke recovery.

  • Stroke Rehabilitation
  • Balance Training
  • Coordination Exercises
  • Cognitive Training

Cardiac Rehabilitation

Safe and effective rehabilitation programs for heart patients.

  • Cardiac Exercise
  • Endurance Training
  • Risk Management
  • Lifestyle Guidance

Pediatric Physiotherapy

Gentle and effective therapy for children with developmental and physical challenges.

  • Developmental Delay
  • Sports Injuries
  • Postural Correction
  • Growth Monitoring

Sports Rehabilitation

Specialized treatment for sports injuries and athletic performance enhancement.

  • Injury Recovery
  • Performance Enhancement
  • Prevention Programs
  • Return to Sport

Geriatric Care

Specialized physiotherapy for elderly patients focusing on mobility and independence.

  • Balance Training
  • Fall Prevention
  • Strength Building
  • Pain Management
About Dr. Pooja

Meet Your Physiotherapist

Dr. Pooja is a dedicated and experienced physiotherapist committed to helping patients achieve their recovery goals and improve their quality of life.

Clinical experience

Care approach

Expertise & Qualifications

With over 8 years of experience in physiotherapy, Dr. Pooja specializes in providing comprehensive rehabilitation services using evidence-based techniques and personalized treatment approaches.

Professional Qualifications

  • Bachelor of Physiotherapy (BPT)
  • Master of Physiotherapy (MPT)
  • Specialized in Neurological Rehabilitation
  • Certified in Manual Therapy
  • Advanced Training in Sports Rehabilitation
